channel.title: "Error: Could not find or load main class [File Location]"
channel.description: Alright, so, i've been having problems opening .jars lately. So I went to change the default program for them through the control panel. But I think that might've only made it worse. I changed it to javac, to javaw, to javaws, then to java, and now I get the error "Error: Could not find or load main class [File location]". I can't seem to figure out how to fix this, and its starting to piss me off a little. Any of you know how to fix this?

item.title: "Error: Could not find or load main class [File Location]"
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

sounds like you need to rejar after recompiling

Read full topic

Alright, so, i’ve been having problems opening .jars lately. So I went to change the default program for them through the control panel. But I think that might’ve only made it worse. I changed it to javac, to javaw, to javaws, then to java, and now I get the error “Error: Could not find or load main class [File location]”. I can’t seem to figure out how to fix this, and its starting to piss me off a little.
Any of you know how to fix this?
